title: PBE status site down!
body: I try to go https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup and the site seems to be down for my friends and I. For me it doesn't respond then ends with "Error 500".

replies.body:
The 500 error on that page usually means there's something up with your path to that page. Using a VPN such as [**Cyberghost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us) or [**Hotspot Shield**](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) before visiting that page should serve as a workaround.

Let me know if this caused any change.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=twgcsE3Z,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-16T03:26:04.308+0000)
>
> The 500 error on that page usually means there's something up with your path to that page. Using a VPN such as [**Cyberghost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us) or [**Hotspot Shield**](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) before visiting that page should serve as a workaround.
> 
> Let me know if this caused any change.

Sorry if this is late but there is no change... I've been having trouble recently where my browser just doesn't load certain images (like the youtube profile pics or Surrender@20 pictures). My browser has just been going crazy, I should probably reinstall chrome.

EDIT: It fixed itself... wow
